unnormalised: Arre, Policybazaar check kar, yaar! Mhaka term insurance fakt Rs. 12000/voros ₹1 crorechea coverak mell'lem.
normalised: Arre, Policybazaar check kor, yaar! Mhaka mhaje term insurance fokot bara hozar rupiya prati varshak ek crore rupiyanche cover mell'lle.
text: Arre, Policybazaar check kar, yaar! Mhaka term insurance fakt Rs. 12000/voros ₹1 crorechea coverak mell'lem.
